step.text: <html>Glucose is an essential substrate for the metabolism of most cells. Because glucose is a polar molecule, its transport through biological membranes requires specific transporter proteins. Down here the structure of the glut1 transporter from diffrent views.</html>
<html>The Glucose molecules in this example are too large to freely pass through the membrane. This Glucose Transporter allows them through the specific channel through the protein. </html>
